page.title: 14QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content:
The questions that we asked a number of local people produced many very interesting facts. A few of those facts,answers and conclusions that can be drawn appear on the following pages as statistical information. Obviously,only a small percentage of the population were interviewed so the figures should perhaps only be used as a guideline to general feelings about the area. Here are some of the more reliable conclusions to be drawn :
The older inhabitants had lived in the village for an average of 25 years and in their present house for 10.5 years.Of these people,over 1/3 of them went to this school,and 75% of them had lived in another house in the village,before moving to where they live now. (continued)
